parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of waypoints for the specified unit/group.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''waypoints''' groupName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> groupName: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of waypoints each in format [[Waypoint]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>[[waypoints]] [[player]];</code> 
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value><code>_wPosArray = [[waypoints]] group10; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>could return [[EAST 1-1-A,0],[EAST 1-1-A,1],[EAST 1-1-A,2]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypointSpeed]], [[setWPPos]], [[waypointName]]
</value></part></template>
